phrase.paradox.hurt_2: That hurt more than I expected!
phrase.paradox.hurt_16: That armor isn’t cheap, you know.
phrase.paradox.hurt_17: I felt that in my soul.
phrase.paradox.hurt_19: Do you mind not stabbing me?
phrase.paradox.hurt_22: You could’ve just talked to me!
phrase.paradox.hurt_23: Is this how you treat everyone?
phrase.paradox.hurt_35: This won’t end well for you.
phrase.paradox.hurt_39: I was just minding my business.
phrase.paradox.hurt_40: What did I ever do to you?
phrase.paradox.hurt_45: That’s going to leave a scar.
phrase.paradox.hurt_57: Do you even know who I am?
phrase.paradox.hurt_58: I’ll make you pay for that.
phrase.paradox.hurt_59: You’ll wish you hadn’t done that.
phrase.paradox.hurt_61: That’s it — I’m done being nice.
phrase.paradox.hurt_68: Did you mean to do that?
phrase.paradox.hurt_70: Fine! If it’s war you want...
phrase.paradox.hurt_71: I hope you’re ready for payback.
phrase.paradox.hurt_77: Was that supposed to scare me?
phrase.paradox.hurt_80: Careful where you swing that thing.
phrase.paradox.hurt_81: I’ll pretend that was an accident.
phrase.paradox.hurt_82: Next time, I won’t go easy.
phrase.paradox.hurt_85: You better hope I forget this.
phrase.paradox.hurt_86: So this is how it’s going to be?
phrase.paradox.hurt_97: You really shouldn’t have done that.
phrase.paradox.hurt_99: That’s it. I’m done being nice.
phrase.paradox.revenge_18: I told you not to push me.
phrase.paradox.revenge_19: I didn’t want to do that... but I did.
phrase.paradox.revenge_22: And that’s the end of that.
phrase.paradox.revenge_31: Maybe next time you’ll think first.
phrase.paradox.revenge_35: I told you this would happen.
phrase.paradox.revenge_36: I hope it was worth it.
phrase.paradox.revenge_51: Next time, don’t start a fight.
phrase.paradox.revenge_56: I didn’t want to, but you forced me.
phrase.paradox.revenge_57: That was for all the pain.
phrase.paradox.revenge_73: I told you to walk away.
phrase.paradox.revenge_92: This is the end for you.
phrase.paradox.revenge_93: I warned you it’d end this way.
phrase.paradox.revenge_102: I told you not to bother me!
phrase.paradox.revenge_103: I DIDN'T WANT TO KILL MYSELF!
phrase.paradox.greeting_2: Ah, a familiar face in an unfamiliar time.
phrase.paradox.greeting_4: You’re not from here, are you?
phrase.paradox.greeting_5: Don’t be afraid. I mean no harm.
phrase.paradox.greeting_6: Time is thin here, can you feel it?
phrase.paradox.greeting_7: I’ve seen you before... or maybe later.
phrase.paradox.greeting_9: You arrived earlier than I expected.
phrase.paradox.greeting_10: Your aura burns bright in this era.
phrase.paradox.greeting_11: Ah, the threads of fate tug again.
phrase.paradox.greeting_12: I didn’t think I’d meet someone real again.
phrase.paradox.greeting_13: You remind me of someone I failed to save.
phrase.paradox.greeting_14: Hello there... what year is it?
phrase.paradox.greeting_16: Another wanderer, drawn by the paradox.
phrase.paradox.greeting_18: You glow differently from the rest.
phrase.paradox.greeting_20: You shouldn’t be here, yet you are.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_1: I come from a time after the collapse.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_2: The future is a desert of silence.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_3: Machines forgot how to dream, and so did we.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_4: I walked through centuries to find a moment of peace.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_5: They said time travel was impossible. They were right.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_6: Every step I take rewrites something.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_7: The world I knew no longer remembers my name.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_8: There was light once. Then only ash.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_9: I wasn’t supposed to survive the paradox.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_10: The stars blinked out before we did.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_11: Do you hear the ticking? That’s not a clock.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_12: I left my body behind long ago.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_13: My memories are folded like paper.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_14: Don’t ask how far I’ve traveled. You wouldn’t believe it.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_15: I came to warn... but forgot what of.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_16: This isn’t the first time we’ve met.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_17: The future has no sun, only reflections.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_18: We thought control meant safety. We were wrong.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_19: I can’t stay long. The loop resists me.
phrase.paradox.dialogue_20: Every choice here echoes forward. Be careful.
phrase.paradox.gift_1: Take this, it's an artifact from another timeline
phrase.paradox.gift_2: I don’t need it where I’m going anyways.
phrase.paradox.gift_3: A gift, get it. Just don't ask why.
phrase.paradox.gift_4: Keep it. I hope it will save you from what's about to happen.
phrase.paradox.gift_5: This once belonged to a better world.
phrase.paradox.gift_6: It’s not much, but it’s what i got.
phrase.paradox.gift_7: Time owes you this, this is my last hope.
phrase.paradox.gift_8: It will help you, perhaps. On your way.
phrase.paradox.gift_9: I made it in time, perhaps it won't happen again if i give you this.
phrase.paradox.gift_10: Every cycle, I give this to someone new.
phrase.paradox.gift_11: This may guide you when I’m gone.
phrase.paradox.gift_12: Take it. Don’t ask from where, or what this is.
phrase.paradox.gift_13: A relic. Just take it, i know you have a lot of questions.
phrase.paradox.gift_14: I don't have time to answer your questions, but take this.
phrase.paradox.gift_15: Save it for later, you may need it.
phrase.paradox.goodbye_1: Our meeting was brief, but enough.
phrase.paradox.goodbye_6: Don’t look for me after i go.
phrase.paradox.goodbye_7: I’m fading. It means i don't have a lot time left, bye.
phrase.paradox.goodbye_8: I hope your era treats you kindly, i will go now.
phrase.paradox.goodbye_10: Maybe next time, we’ll get it right.
phrase.paradox.goodbye_11: I must go before the loop snaps.
phrase.paradox.goodbye_12: You’ll forget me. It’s safer that way.
phrase.paradox.goodbye_13: You may rest for now, but beware later, because i need to go now.
phrase.paradox.confused_2: Don’t run, I mean no harm!
phrase.paradox.confused_3: You can’t escape time, another me!
phrase.paradox.confused_7: I still have more to tell!
phrase.paradox.confused_10: I didn’t mean to scare you...
gui.jei.description.one_handed_sword: Can be acquired by encountering player echo with good personality, he may give you this sword as a reward.
